mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (user_seq, title, content, reg_dt) values ( #{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.board_id = #{boardId}

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image_url, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt from BOARD b, USERS u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from board b where b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
